nodes.text: The Byron College was a prestigious place of learning on the planet Alderaan, before its destruction by the Galactic Empire in 0 BBY. The College was part of the capital city of Aldera. The famous Alderaanian poetess Hari Seldona studied ancient litterature at the Byron College.
The Byron College was created by Philippe Rat for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario Prélude à un Nouvel Espoir which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 103.
